name: Use of Redundant Code
description:
The software has multiple functions, methods, procedures, macros, etc. that
					contain the same code.
extended_description: <xhtml:p>This issue makes it more difficult to maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  For example, if there are two copies of the same code, the programmer might fix a weakness in one copy while forgetting to fix the same weakness in another copy.</xhtml:p>

submission.submission_comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
